body.para: Please sync ocp 1:0.1.17-1 (universe) from Debian unstable (main).
Only Ubuntu upload was a no-change rebuild.
* New upstream version. (Closes: #535005, #453877) * Add libasound2-dev for ALSA support. (Closes: #453871) * Updated homepage address. * Update my email address.
** Affects: ocp (Ubuntu) Importance: Wishlist Status: Confirmed
** Changed in: ocp (Ubuntu) Importance: Undecided => Wishlist
** Changed in: ocp (Ubuntu) Status: New => Confirmed
